name: John Doe
subject: Cannot access admin panel
description: I'm unable to login to the admin panel. Getting 'Invalid credentials' error even though I'm using the correct password. This is urgent as I need to process pending orders.

comments.author: Support Team
comments.text: Hi John, we're looking into this issue. Can you try clearing your browser cache and cookies?

comments.author: John Doe
comments.text: I tried that but still getting the same error.

name: Jane Smith
subject: Incorrect invoice amount
description: I received an invoice for $500 but my plan is only $200/month. Please check and correct this.

comments.author: Billing Team
comments.text: We found the issue. There was a billing system error. We've corrected your invoice and sent the updated one to your email.

comments.author: Jane Smith
comments.text: Thank you! Invoice received and looks correct now.

name: Robert Chen
subject: Product feature request
description: Would be great if you could add dark mode to the application. Many users work at night and it would be easier on the eyes.

name: Sarah Johnson
subject: Unable to reset password
description: I'm not receiving the password reset email. I've checked spam folder and it's not there. Need urgent help as I have important work to do.

comments.author: Support Team
comments.text: Hi Sarah, we're checking the email delivery logs. Can you confirm your registered email address?

name: Michael Brown
subject: API documentation unclear
description: The API documentation for the /users endpoint is missing examples. Could you please add some code examples for common use cases?
